headline: P&G’s Cascade Celebrates 70 Years by Partnering with Feeding America® to Support Families Facing Hunger, Helping to Provide Up to 1 Million Meals**
summary: CINCINNATI, November 13, 2025--For 70 years, Cascade, America’s #1 recommended dishwasher detergent brand* has been a household staple, trusted by generations of families for its powerful, reliable, and safe clean. The brand has been alongside families during countless meals, moments, and messes by taking care of the cleanup and giving people time back to enjoy the company of loved ones.
